00017 #include "integration.h"
00018 
00019 typedef struct{
00020   Tetrahedron_3 H;
00021   double radius;
00022   int l;
00023   int m;
00024 } Parameters;
00025 
00026 /**
00027 *Evaluation of the real part \f$Y_l^m(\theta, \varphi)sin(\theta)cos(m\varphi)\f$
00028 */
00029 double gr (double *k, size_t dim, void *params)
00030 {
00031   Parameters param = *((Parameters *) params);
00032   //check if the point is inside the tetrahedron or not
00033   Point_3 p = Point_3(param.radius*cos(k[0])*sin(k[1]),param.radius*sin(k[0])*sin(k[1]), param.radius*cos(k[1]));
00034   if(param.H.has_on_bounded_side(p)){
00035     double A;
00036     if(param.m==0)
00037       A = gsl_sf_legendre_sphPlm (param.l, param.m, cos(k[1]))*sin(k[1]);
00038     else
00039       A = gsl_sf_legendre_sphPlm (param.l, param.m, cos(k[1]))*cos(param.m*k[0])*sin(k[1]);
00040     return A;
00041   }else
00042     return 0.0;
00043 }
00044 /**
00045 *Evaluation of the imaginary part \f$Y_l^m(\theta, \varphi)sin(\theta)sin(m\varphi)\f$
00046 */
00047 double gi (double *k, size_t dim, void *params)
00048 {
00049   Parameters param = *((Parameters *) params);
00050   //check if the point is inside the tetrahedron or not
00051   Point_3 p = Point_3(param.radius*cos(k[0])*sin(k[1]),param.radius*sin(k[0])*sin(k[1]), param.radius*cos(k[1]));
00052   if(param.H.has_on_bounded_side(p)){
00053     double A;
00054     if(param.m==0)
00055       A = 0.0;
00056     else
00057       A = gsl_sf_legendre_sphPlm (param.l, param.m, cos(k[1]))*sin(-param.m*k[0])*sin(k[1]);
00058     return A;
00059   }else
00060     return 0.0;  
00061 }
00062 /**
00063 *Integrate the \f$\int\int_{T}Y_l^m(\theta, \varphi)e^{-im\varphi}\f$
00064 */
00065 
00066 void Integrate(int l, int m, double radius, Tetrahedron_3  H, gsl_complex *result, gsl_complex *error)
00067 {
00068   double rres, rerr, ires, ierr;
00069   
00070   double mintheta, maxtheta, minphi, maxphi;
00071   theta_phi_bounds(Triangle_3(H[1],H[2],H[3]), &mintheta, &maxtheta, &minphi, &maxphi);
00072   double xl[2] = { 0.0, 0.0 };
00073   double xu[2] = { 2.0*M_PI, M_PI};
00074 
00075   const gsl_rng_type *T;
00076   gsl_rng *r;
00077   Parameters param = {H, radius, l, m};
00078   gsl_monte_function Gr = { &gr, 2, &param };
00079   gsl_monte_function Gi = { &gi, 2, &param };
00080 
00081   size_t calls = 1000;
00082 
00083   gsl_rng_env_setup ();
00084 
00085   T = gsl_rng_default;
00086   r = gsl_rng_alloc (T);
00087 
00088   gsl_monte_plain_state *s = gsl_monte_plain_alloc (2);
00089   gsl_monte_plain_integrate (&Gr, xl, xu, 2, calls, r, s, &rres, &rerr);
00090   gsl_monte_plain_init (s);
00091   gsl_monte_plain_integrate (&Gi, xl, xu, 2, calls, r, s, &ires, &ierr);
00092   gsl_monte_plain_free (s);
00093   
00094   GSL_SET_COMPLEX(result, rres, ires);
00095   GSL_SET_COMPLEX(error, rerr, ierr);
00096   gsl_rng_free (r);
00097 }
